channel.title: [721] Turmoil Pkzs || Torva || Choatics || Tokhaar Kal || Overloads || Curses
channel.description:
Client Download Mirrors: [url=https://www.box.com/s/086d04f8e3184477a51c]Download Now![/url] Website : http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/index.html Forums : http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/phpBB3/index.php Donate :http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/donate.html Vote : http://www.turmoilpkzs.hostzi.com/vote.html [FONT=Myriad Pro][u]Why Choose Turmoil Pkzs[/u] Turmoil Pkzsis a fully functional Economy server with 30+ players and a dedicated hardworking staff We are brand new and need some dedicated players who love to pk to join our community We have an awesome staff a great pking server, hand coded website and a forums thats ready to go! Our server is running on over 8 GB of dedicated RAM to deliver blazing fast speeds with zero lag!! We have all the items you know and love such as torva, staff of light, korasi, barrows with working set effect, chaotics, pernix, virtus, spirit shields claws and sooo much more ;)
[u]Staff List[/u] Owner/Developer:Aerodude Co-Owner/Assistant Coder: Petarpwns11 Admin:Open Admin:Open Mod:Open Mod:Open
[u]Turmoil's Features[/u] -721 Graphics, anims gfx emotes [b]Completionist cape emote works 100% [/b] -added brand new donor system, and voting system -vote for cash option -dedicated programmers to deliver the best gaming experience possible -new home -Zenith 721 client -added x10 hits - all 4 spirit shields damage soaking added -summoning completed 100% with yaks and titans -pack yaks actually hold items -All godswords with specials -Dungeoneering base -Curses with Soul Split and Turmoil leeching works 100% -perfected vengeance -awesome deflect melee, range, and mage (deflects damage back at attacker) with correct animations -leech skills and specials working for ancient curses -Fun Pking -Real wildy with multi zones and lvl differences -24/7 uptime -Double Exp weekends with double Dungeoneering and Pking points -Real ancient magicks with ice barrage+effect + orb animation -Lunar magics with venge -Awesome staff -Ancient warriors equipment -Fully functioning Donor system, website, and forums -WEBCLIENT ON THE WAY -[b]Now Compatible With Macs!![/b] -All spirit shields including divine with effect creating spirit shield with sigils works as well -All chaotics!!!!!!!!!! (Rapier longsword kiteshield maul staff crossbow and some more that im forgetting :) -Torva Virtus and Pernix armours -Overloads, Staff of light, korasi's sword with special! -[b]Tokhaar-Kal, Completionist, and Max capes with particle effect when you walk [/b] -staff of light cuts damage in half for 1 minuete! -721 items (choatics overloads, torva, Tokhaar kal, Completionist Cape,etc) -D claws of course ;P -And perfefct modern Pking just like in RS! [u]Minigames[/u] - Barrows - Pest Control - Tzhaar Cave - Fight Pits - Fight Kiln - Duel Arena[/FONT]
Come join us we would love to have you be a part of our community were online NOW!!

item.description:
@Broken-Reality wrote:

[quote=“dclawed, post:5, topic:456969”]Hello,

I am posting to apply for Admin, I am 14, mature, helpfuly, friendly, I have 3 years experience and know what I am doing, I would love to make this server have 100+ people, and my goals for this server will be set high, it would be lovely if I could work along side you, I am very active, and know all codes. I would do community events, random giveaways and make a lot of guides.

Thank you
Dclawed[/quote]

WHY HAVE I SEEN YOU ON LIKE 4 DIFFERENT POST’S APPLYING FOR STAFF:L SERIOUSLY KID, GET A LIFE.

No edits or new content added? Alright.

Also, look at that screenshot where it tells you “Use your Firecape on the Orb to summon the N.P.C.”. You’re expecting players to sit back and not compete for kills? Come on, that’s so lazy.
